price: Dizem: "Quando morrermos e formos pó e ossos, seremos ressuscitados?
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗا وَعِظَٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبۡعُوثُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qālū a-idhā mit'nā wakunnā turāban waʿiẓāman a-innā lamabʿūthūna
